name: reactnd-project-readable
description: Readables is a content and comment web app built primarily with React, Redux and React-Router.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm start" "cd api-server && PORT=3001 npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: (cd api-server && npm install) && (cd frontend/ && npm install && npm run build)

author: clive cadogan
